name: jester

scripts.build-js: (mkdir -p web/assets/js/ && bin/browserify src/assets/js/app.js web/assets/js/app.js && bin/notify 'JS Compiled') || bin/notify 'Failure: JS Compilation'

author: Chris Ciampoli <chrisciampoli@gmail.com>
description: A test of am Depdencny injection library for javascript
